channel.title: R on A. Brown Blogdown Website
channel.description: Recent content in R on A. Brown Blogdown Website

item.title: Initial Post
item.description: Hi There, This is my initial post on my blog! I am excited to have a space to share my thoughts, opinions, and data explorations on the internet. I donâ€™t do a whole lot of social media like Facebook, Twitter, etc. Although, I do Snap Chat sometimes with some friends and share on my story (@alexb523). So this will be a nice way to get what I think is important out there.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
